newsitem.title: GERMANY: SOCCER-FEYENOORD LOAN SAGANOWSKI TO HAMBURG.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-FEYENOORD LOAN SAGANOWSKI TO HAMBURG.

text.p: Polish international Marek Saganowski is set to spend the rest of the season at German first division side Hamburg on loan from Dutch club Feyenoord Rotterdam, Hamburg announced on Monday.
Hamburg said they had also agreed an option to buy the 18-year-old forward.

The move means the club has added two Polish internationals to its squad in as many days, after signing defender Pavel Wojtala from Polish side Widzew Lodz at the weekend for an estimated $1.3 million to $2 million.
